local_intent: Perceive bread, approach and align, set yaw, push bread 0.1m left (180 deg), allow settling, retreat, and verify visibility.
assumptions: Plate is left of bread so direction 180 drives toward plate
Yaw 90 configures tool for lateral push
Bread remains visible after push for verification
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: scan if not visible, detect, move above, align, set yaw=90, push 0.1 at 180 deg, wait, retreat; final visibility check provides minimal verification.
